次の日、練習を前に俺はトレブルクインテットを屋内訓練場に\n呼び出した。本来の彼:
The next day, before practice, I took Treburg Integrity to the indoor training grounds
I've summoned them. It's to get a grasp on their true abilities.
さて、改めて実力を見せて欲しい。\n相手としては、教導指揮官として声をかけたチー:
Now then, I want you to show me your true strength once again.
As an opponent, the team I called out to as the instructor commander was my opponent.
以前にスカラ校舎で知り合った優秀なチームである。\n成長したシリウスシュガーに勝:
They were an excellent team I had met in the Scara school building before.
She saw him as no better than the grown Sirius Sugaru.
りょです！ 相手はスカラ校舎の方ですね！\n前はかっこ悪い所を見せちゃったので、:
That's right! We're talking about the Scara school building!
I showed you my lame side before, so I'll show you my good side!
そういってトレブルクインテットはＭＧに乗り込んで準備をする。: With that, Treburg Integrity boarded the MG and got ready.
教導指揮官さん、あいつらの相手は本気でやればいいの？: Instructor, should we really be dealing with them?
ああ。遠慮なくやってくれ。何なら倒してもいいぞ。: Yeah. Don't hesitate to do it. You can take him down if you want.
なるほどね、次の公式ＭＧ競技に向けていい練習相手になるわ。\n相手にとって不足な:
I see. He'll be a good practice partner for the next official MG event.
There's no shortage of opponents!
彼女たちとどこまで戦えるのか……\nトレブルクインテットの実力を試す試金石となる:
I don't know how much I can fight them...
It would serve as a test stone to test Treburg Integrity's abilities.
さて……それじゃあ試合を開始してくれ！: Now then... Let the match begin!
そして、２チームの模擬戦が始まる。: Then, the mock battle between the two teams began.
さあて、さっそく突撃するわ！ 後ろはお願いね！: All right, let's charge in! Take care of the rear!
はいはいっと。それじゃあ、私も一緒に行くよ～。\nエヴィとフルートはサポートお願:
Alright, alright. I'll come with you, then.
Eve and Flute, please support me.
（まずはレイラたちが突撃か……）: (Rayla and the others will charge first...)
馬鹿正直に突っ込んできて、良い的じゃない！\n全員、集中砲火！:
It's not a good target for you to charge in and be honest!
All units, focus fire!
ロージーちゃん、気にせずにアゲアゲで行きましょう！: Rosie, don't worry about it. Let's go with Ageage!
後ろは気にせずに、任せて！: Don't worry about what's behind you. Leave it to me!
真っ直ぐに突撃したロージーへの攻撃を打ち落とし、\nフルートとエヴィ、シエナは彼:
He struck down the attack on Rosie, who charged straight at him
Flute, Eve, and Siena supported the path she'd taken to cut in.
ふふ、いいわね！ やっぱりみんな最高よ！: Haha, that's great! Everyone's the best!
ロージー！ 横から来てるよ！\nこっちは任せて、対処お願い！:
Rosie! It's coming from the side!
Leave this to me, and deal with it!
突撃してきたロージーを隠れて挟撃しようとした２人のスカラ生徒。\nしかし、それを:
The two Scara students hid Rosie, who had charged at them, and tried to pincer her.
However, Leila sensed it and intercepted it, creating a one-on-one fight.
くっ、立て直すぞ！: Ugh, let's get back on our feet!
させないわ！ もっと付き合って貰うわよ！: I won't let you! You'll have to go out with me more!
挟撃に失敗した２人を釘付けにするレイラとロージー。\nそして、そこにフルートたち:
Leila and Rosie nailed the two who had failed in their pincer attack.
And there, the flutes charged toward the center.
シエナちゃん、エヴィちゃん、バイブスアゲアゲでいきますよ～！: Siena, Eve, let's go with Vibes Ageage!
うん、任せて、準備は万全だよ。: Yeah, leave it to me. I'm ready.
落ち着け！ こっちの意表を突いてきただけだ。\n冷静に対処を……:
Calm down! She just caught me off guard.
Calm down and deal with it...
前線を張る２人を援護する形を崩して、\n突如として３人が突撃したことに驚くスカラ:
I broke the form of supporting the two on the front lines
The Scara school team was surprised by the sudden charge of the three of them.
そして、突撃に合わせてフルートたちの背後から援護射撃が飛んでくる。: Then, in time with the charge, support fire came flying from behind the flutes.
ちょ、ちょっと！？ なんで援護射撃が……: H-Hey!? Why are you covering fire...?
ごめん、逃げられた！ あいつらいきなり下がって……: Sorry, they got away! They suddenly stepped back...
ふっふっふ、フルートたちは皆仲良しですから形に縛られません！\nみんながエースで:
Hehehe, the flutes are all good friends, so they're not bound by form!
Everyone's an ace, and everyone's a supporter!
まあ、それって裏を返すと、\n『器用貧乏』ってことなんだけどね。:
Well, if you turn that around...
It's called "dexterity poverty."
軽いやり取りをしながらも、アタッカーがサポートに回り、逆も起こる。\nそんな縦横:
We had a light exchange, but the attackers acted as support, and vice versa.
They cornered the Scara school building students with such a wide variety of maneuvers.
（これだ……お互いの信頼の上で役割を簡単に変えることが出来る。\n付け焼刃でやれ:
(This is it... We can easily change our roles based on mutual trust.
(If I do it with a tacky blade, I'm sure it'll collapse easily due to a liaison mistake.)
（型にハマらない自由さ……これはトレブルクインテットの強みだ。\n突出した個の強:
(Freedom that doesn't fit the mold... This is Treburg Integrity's strength.
It's a different kind of strength from Chaos Maiden, who crushes them with the strength of an individual who sticks out.)
コロコロと変わっていくポジション。相手は常に対応を迫られ、\n徐々に消耗していき:
The position is changing. The opponent is always forced to respond.
They gradually wore themselves down, dropping them one by one.
ぐっ……くそ……！ なんて奴らだ……！: Ugh... Dammit...! What the hell are they...?!
そして試合が終わり、フルートたちは戻ってくる。: Then the match ended, and the flutes returned.
えへへ、どうでしたか！ フルートたちの良さを見て貰えましたか！: Ehehe, how was it?! Did you see how good the flutes are?!
ああ、見事なもんだ……あの時と別物過ぎるな。: Yeah, it's impressive... It's way too different from back then.
（やはりあのときはすべての状況が俺達に味方していたわけだな。\n本気でやりあえば:
(So all the circumstances were on our side at the time.
If they really fight each other, their experience, technique, and coordination are all superior to the flutes.)
それで、教導指揮官的にまだまだ見たりないかな？\nもっと見たいっていうなら、やっ:
So, do you think you've still got a long way to go as an instructor?
If you want to see more, I can do it.
十分だ。お前達のことは理解できたし、今日は休んでくれ。\n明日からの訓練に期待し:
That's enough. I understand you guys, so rest for today.
I look forward to your training starting tomorrow.
